archimate:Stakeholder.name: Organisation
archimate:Stakeholder.documentation:
In EIRA, organisation is documented as follows: http://data.europa.eu/dr8/Organisation
The "LegalEntity" ABB496 represents the generic concept of a stakeholder in EIRA5. "Individual" and "Organisation" are specialisations of this ABB. On their turn, "Public Administration" and "Business" are specialisations of "Organisation".
For this reason, in KU Leuven PAA, we use "Organisation" as the stereotype for legal entities that are NOT Public Administrations or Businesses, like for example : not for profit organisations, NGOs, citizen representation groups etc.
The original documentation of the Organisation ABB494 is as follows: DEFINITION: Organisation ABB is a Stakeholder acting as a company that is formed for a particular purpose.
Source: Gartner (https://www.gartner.com/en/glossary)
